titles.title: Elementary Science Facilities Act
To provide assistance to States to enable such States to raise the quality of instruction in mathematics and science by providing equipment and materials necessary for hands-on instruction.

bill.summary: 7/23/1993--Introduced. Elementary Science Facilities Act - Authorizes the Secretary of Education to allot funds to State educational agencies to award grants to local educational agencies to provide hands-on instruction equipment and materials to elementary schools to improve mathematics and science education. Authorizes appropriations. Sets forth requirements for: (1) State allotments; (2) State and local applications; (3) grant award priorities; (4) State and Federal responsibilities; and (5) limitation of the use of grant funds to science equipment or materials and mathematical manipulative materials necessary for hands-on instruction only.
